about_the_game:
The IVADA Cataclysm Set bundle includes:

  • 1 Legendary IVADA Predaclipser outfit

  • 1 Legendary IVADA Nyavolt XP-54 skin

  • 1 Legendary OutsparkL.E.D. charm

  • 1 Legendary OutsparkL.E.D. sticker

  • 1 Epic Sharp Reflection emote

  • 2 400 Multibucks

content_descriptors.notes: THE FINALS is the worlds greatest virtual combat entertainment game show, and as such features virtual violence. There's no gore or blood -- contestants turn into a pile of coins when eliminated.
